website_summaries.verdict: This supercharged graphics card features award-winning performance that provides unparalleled, smooth gameplay.
pros: This 6GB graphics card works best with current games and has a dual-link display port with a maximum resolution of 7680 x 4320
Unit is supported by DirectX 12, OpenGL 4.5, and Vulkan
cons: Some users have experienced compatibility issues with older operating systems

customer_reviews.title: You get more than what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Bought this card as an upgrade to my gtx1050 ti and I'm impressed by the quality and how quiet this card is. If your looking to upgrade your gaming experience at the price of cost I'd recommend this card highly . VR performance output from this card is impressive to say the least to
customer_reviews.author: Cxrruptdreamer

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: Watched online reviews so knew what to expect, looks good with the back plate (plastic) and twin fans not to loud, temps 65deg at load in my case. With a ryzen 5 1600x the graphics card is still the bottle neck.
customer_reviews.author: Toonooky

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, performs even better. An excellent graphics card for mid tier gaming systems. I paired mine with a Ryzen 5 2600x and it runs any game on high or ultra settings at 1080p
customer_reviews.author: AmazingAmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised with this card, it's very quiet while maintaining good temps. Under a good load, the speed stays under 60% and keeps the temp under 50^c and it quieter than my case fans. Good value for what it is, and runs most things - You won't be able to max out the graphics on some of the newer games, but on a budget or not wanting to spend too much, games look really nice with 60+ frames.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great Entry VR GPU
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a slight upgrade to my rig to get better performance for my Oculus Rift S and I'm blown away at the price for how well it works. For just a little over £200, it's an amazing graphics card for the price. Couldn't be happier. Works a treat with my Oculus Rift S lets me play Pavlov on Very High, Robo Recall works with no issues. 5/5
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Good performance
customer_reviews.text: These were part of a new PC build. Very pleased with the fitting and the performance.
customer_reviews.author: RK

customer_reviews.title: The best of the friggin best
customer_reviews.text: This product is just amazing. Upgrading from a gt 640 was always going to be a difference but wow. This card literally does everything, and can run shaders easily. The heck you can run shadow of the tomb raider on high quality on this beast. Just to iterate , I got this for my birthday, and I’m so glad I chose it. Fantastic for gaming and great all round. Totally recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Atlas185

customer_reviews.title: Runs ok for its age
customer_reviews.text: runs ok for it is age but worth the price paid.
customer_reviews.author: David Crombie

customer_reviews.title: Unusable unit,  returned for refund.
customer_reviews.text: Possibly was a second-hand unit - no plastic covering or seal on box. The HDMI output would not work and one of the three DisplayPort outputs sent corrupted data to the monitor. All in all, complete garbage. Awaiting refund, which was agreed by Amazon readily as always.
customer_reviews.author: Mr W.

customer_reviews.title: Great budget card
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from a GTX960 and the difference is amazing. Its smashing everything I throw at it without the fans even starting up. Locked it at 60fps in world of warcraft but was getting 97fps before I done that. Overall great card, just make sure your psu has a spare 8 pin plug.
customer_reviews.author: Paul G.

customer_reviews.title: Original box was damaged
customer_reviews.text: It came on gigabyte box with full of stickers and torn apart box , the graphic card is working fine with Intel Pentium G4560 ti and DDR 4 2133 16 GB ram, I have to return it though cause when I'm going to sell the card I cannot do that cause the original box came damaged.
customer_reviews.author: arisas

customer_reviews.title: Great build quality, excellent for all sorts of games
customer_reviews.text: I bought this gpu for my first gaming rig. Paired with my AMD ryzen 5 2600, this is a monster. Can happily play valorant, Csgo and a lot of other games well over 250fps.never overheats. The fans are very quiet, and effective. This is a great buy for this price. Can run any game no problems
customer_reviews.author: Ayman

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, powerful beast
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a Rx 570 I was unhappy with (bad thermals, loud). Can't fault this at all, can't hear it over anything else in my system.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Good Value; Good Performance and Quiet
customer_reviews.text: Just installed this on a mini-ITX build for a mid-spec gaming PC. Plays most games at 1080 p Ultra settings no problem and a few higher. As a bonus this is a quiet card and keeps the temps down too.
customer_reviews.author: J. Fox

customer_reviews.title: Best budget pc build
customer_reviews.text: Its the best value for money GPU in my opinion and brought this item for my friend thats starting to get into pc gaming and it was a perfect first choice as it can still last with high Graphics
customer_reviews.author: Cem

customer_reviews.title: Solid entry graphics card
customer_reviews.text: For £200 this card really packs a punch and will run most games at 1080p/60fps on high settings easily. It can also handle mods too as I've heavily modded games like The Witcher 3 and Skyrim and it still runs fantastic. Anyone who is thinking about getting a gaming PC should definitely consider buying this product as it will not disappoint. My specs are: GTX 1660 AMD RYZEN 5 2600X CPU GIGABYTE B450M MOTHERBOARD
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: HIGH OVERCLOCKING POTENTIAL
customer_reviews.text: Due to the size of the cooler this card can me easily overclocked. I managed to stably overlocking to 1000mghz on the memory and 170mghz on the core clock. Even with that te temperatures do not exceed 60 degrees Celsius. Such a over clocked ads around 10% of extra performance.
customer_reviews.author: Kordian

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, Easy to Install, Works Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with a bunch of components to build a PC for my son's birthday. It is exactly as described, and works perfectly. It was very easy to use and set up.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew. S.

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: Not tried it on yet but the value is great
customer_reviews.author: Bo Gunnarsson

customer_reviews.title: Good for mining
customer_reviews.text: I bought this card for Crypto mining. No complaint. Very fast. One of the best on the market. 21MHz for Ethereum. Power usage is acceptable too. 90W.
customer_reviews.author: Chi-Yuen Julius TSUI

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: My son bought this as part of he's project to build his new gaming PC. Easy to put together and holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: nick mandis

customer_reviews.title: Good performance, quiet
customer_reviews.text: Can finally play my favourite games on their highest graphical settings
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming gpu
customer_reviews.text: Great gpu for people getting into pc gaming fits well in low to medium budget builds, with low graphic settings it’s easy to achieve high frames, hasn’t become very warm and was easy to install and set up .
customer_reviews.author: Tj Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant 5 star GPU
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install. Recently built my own pc, package arrived and I installed it with minimal effort. Overall a brilliant gpu, running fortnite on low settings up to 250fps (with a Ryzen 5 3600). Also runs rainbow six siege up to 400+ FPS. Not ran into any problems with over heating. Well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: finn

customer_reviews.title: Good fast Graphics card
customer_reviews.text: Good fast Graphics card, faster that the GTX 1060 6 GB
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth H.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price, if you wait a while.
customer_reviews.text: Really great boost, especially when transferring from Integrated Vega 8. Streaming is actually possible for me now, and all games I play now run fluidly at 60+ fps. The GPU has no issues. It's the delivery that loses a star, as it ended up arriving late. Otherwise, no other problems.
customer_reviews.author: Understandable

customer_reviews.title: Buy it u won't regret it
customer_reviews.text: Really good upgrade well worth the money got a massive increase in performance from my old card and can run any vr game without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: Great graphics. I have the whole computer built using gigabyte parts. Including screen. Great quality products.
customer_reviews.author: Daya_9308

customer_reviews.title: Beast
customer_reviews.text: Am blown away by how this card handles graphics and physics. Certainly exceeded my expectations :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great addition
customer_reviews.text: This was for my first build. Card was easy to install and worked perfectly, only issue I have is that I can't seem to get a video out put ot of the cats and have to use the ports on the motherboard, despite the card still beingrecognised by the pc.
customer_reviews.author: Amal Mathew

customer_reviews.title: Overall good but fans are questionable
customer_reviews.text: The card is a great entry level graphics card, able to push 75fps+ on most modern games on high settings. However the cards fans are pretty loud and make an annoying noise when they speed up about 70%.
customer_reviews.author: Egor Baldin

customer_reviews.title: Gigabyte Aorus GeForce GTX 1660 OC 6G
customer_reviews.text: the product arrived perfectly but one thing i wasn't happy with was that it wasn't boxed in an amazon bow - it just had the address labels stuck to the graphics card box itself.
customer_reviews.author: GTFarming

customer_reviews.title: Ronseal......
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Bought the card to play COD. Runs the game at high res with no issues. Works with high setting for 7D2D and everything else I have thrown at it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Best bang fo buck!
customer_reviews.text: Great card! Overclocked it and manages to play pubg on ultra settings with good framerate!
customer_reviews.author: Jack Gregory

customer_reviews.title: driver dvd not trustful
customer_reviews.text: A bit disappointed because i had to manually find all the drivers online because the dvd that i received didnt worked.
customer_reviews.author: bogdan halici

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for ultra 1080p gaming
customer_reviews.text: Great price and produces over 60fps on ultra 1080p settings on a lot of games
customer_reviews.author: David V.

customer_reviews.title: value performance
customer_reviews.text: Bought two for separate pc builds probably one of the best value for money gpus u can have.
customer_reviews.author: Gareth

customer_reviews.title: Good GPU for price.
customer_reviews.text: Plays games very well on high settings. Plays fortnite on epic with high FPS
customer_reviews.author: Scott Burton

customer_reviews.title: Great GPU
customer_reviews.text: Defiantly overlooked as a GPU, perfect for gaming on most games at 120 FPS, with the according monitor and CPU, defiantly would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mid-range graphics card
customer_reviews.text: This performs really well, and plays the games I like smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: RodTheo

customer_reviews.title: Repair service
customer_reviews.text: I used very well... but how to get repair service about this graphic card?
customer_reviews.author: Yoonho Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great value card
customer_reviews.text: Great midrange GPU runs all my games at 1080p high settings on 144hz no problems :D
customer_reviews.author: billhawley
